description:
A Certificate of Completion will be provided to all students after completing this course.

HTML5 is a core technology markup language of the Internet used for structuring and presenting content for the World wide web. It is the fifth revision of the HTML standard .

"Learn HTML-5 Programming In Just 1 Hour" will make you Learn HTML programming and also you can apply them to make different codes and game development software .

______________________________________________________________________

This course will teach you the full basic knowledge of HTML-5 and techniques of coding in HTML and by the end of this course you will be able to create your program and games in the way you want.

You've always wanted to make your own games. Don't keep on postponing it. Start TODAY with HTML5 game development for iOS, Android, Amazon and Windows 8

The Course contains :

1. Videos with complete explaination and clearity.

2 . Presentations .

3. Complete support on every problem

.

Section included in this course :

1. Let's start with HTML-5.

2. Constructing Shapes in HTML-5.

3. Adding Special tags in HTML-5.

4. Creating games in HTML-5.

5. Using small tags in HTML-5.

6. Adding tables in HTML-5.

Why only HTML-5 :

After completing this course you will be able to:

1. Master in programming codes and games.

2. Design your program in the way you want.

3. Make many new games in the way you want.
title: HTML5 - Mobile Game Development for Beginners
